title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4243.12 - Terms and conditions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4243.12 - Terms and conditions

State Regulations
(a) Loans
will generally not be less than $75,000 or greater than $2,000,000 and shall
generally not exceed 40 percent of the total project costs. (b) Loan guarantees will generally not be
less than $75,000 or greater than $2,000,000 and shall generally not exceed 60
percent of the total credit facility. (c) Interest subsidy grants will generally
not be less than $75,000 or greater than $500,000 and shall reduce interest on
a loan to the eligible recipient for a period of up to five years. The
resultant interest rate generally shall not fall below three percent. (d) The foregoing terms and conditions are in
addition to the applicable general terms and conditions set forth in section
4243.4
of this

Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
4243.12

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
